info.name: Inoreader(no ADs) -New!!!
info.description:
Remove AD containers from Inoreader.
&&&Remove "Adblock Detected" Popup from Inoreader when you use the Adblock Plus plugin.
info.additionalInfo:
This style is base on hellbiz 's works of Inoreader (no ADs).
The page of Inoreader (no ADs) https://userstyles.org/styles/126319/inoreader-no-ads.
I just add the function of Remove "Adblock Detected" Popup from Inoreader when you use the Adblock Plus plugin.

Thank for hellbiz.
